GSD.description:
lockd: detect and reject lock arguments that overflow

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit eb3ebbd26808be6871158934c85916944d094834. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: lockd: detect and reject lock arguments that overflow
